      • getNeighbours

        public int[] getNeighbours(int j)
        Get the neighbouring variables of a given index. For example, 4 1 2 5 3 0 getNeighbours(3) = [2,1,0] // if TYPE = 1 getNeighbours(3) = [4,2,1,0,3] // if TYPE = 2 getNeighbours(3) = [] // if TYPE = 0
        Parameters:
        j - an index
        Returns:
        neighbouring variables of index k NOTE: takes an index, returns variables -- A BIT STRANGE -- should return indices also

      • make

        public void make()
